tool_description: The Lotto API provides access to hundreds of records of drawings for both the Powerball and Mega Millions (USA).
name: Lotto - Powerball and Mega Millions - USA
title: Lotto - Powerball and Mega Millions - USA
tool_name: Lotto - Powerball and Mega Millions - USA

api_list.name: Between Two Dates
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to search for all records for a given `lotto` between two `dates`.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com/powerball/between/11-01-2019/11-30-2019"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com/{lotto}/between/{is_from}/{to}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Specific Drawing
api_list.description: Use this endpoint for a given `lotto` and `date` in `MM-YY-YYYY` format to search for the drawing record.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com/powerball/date/10-27-2021"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com/{lotto}/date/{date}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Cold
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to get the coldest numbers for a given `lotto`. The coldest numbers can also be described as the bottom 5 numbers that have been drawn. This request returns a JSON array of objects with the ball number and counts.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com/megamillions/cold"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com/{lotto}/cold"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Hot
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to get the hottest numbers for a given `lotto`. The hottest numbers can also be described as the top 5 numbers that have been drawn. This request returns a JSON array of objects with the ball number and counts.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com/megamillions/hot"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Counts
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to receive a JSON object with each ball in the given `lotto` as the key, and the number of times it has been drawn as the value.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com/powerball/counts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Latest
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to get the latest drawing record for a given `lotto`.

api_list.name: All
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to grab all drawing records for a given `lotto`.
api_list.code:

url = "https://lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com/powerball/all"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lotto-powerball-and-mega-millions-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
